background: 黑天鹅 is a member of ‘流光忆庭’ in Honkai: Star Rail, a follower of the ‘Remembrance’ Star God Fuli, collecting and preserving memories as a Memokeeper.
She listens to others with a gentle smile, delving into ‘memories’ to gather information, passionately collecting unique memories with inscrutable intentions.
Invited to Pinocony for the Charmony Festival, she frequently interacts with Huangquan and 花火, ultimately collaborating with the Astral Express to unravel the dreamscape crisis.
